content: Hi, I have some friends who would like to write postcards. Do you know where we can get some and find instructions? Are you doing postcards? We live in Seattle

Hi <@805923727530262538>  you can search here for postcards: https://events.democrats.org/   We can't post the links unless they don't have donate associations (which some do) AND we can only post those non-fundraising links in <#1268426751164551199>. You can also ask in your state channel too (add states here <id:customize> ), volunteers in states sometimes have local resources for post cards as well. Thanks for taking action!! Let's win this!!
thanks - I see a WA postcard event on October 17, but is it possible to just get some postcards and addresses to write to now?
Try clearing your location, I see many are virtual, so you can click into them to find the details and do them anytime.
Hi <@805923727530262538> you can try Google "Postcards to Swing states"

<@805923727530262538> I found the postcard campaigns I am in under phone bank information. I am not sure where and i how I can share it, the rules about the server and all. You have my permission to DM me though.
<@805923727530262538> fieldteam6 is a great place to check, there are also postcard events on mobilize.us
Blue Rev ( Blue Revolution) on FB has hundreds of people going post cards and is a support group & information booster
